testCase.name: LOGIN If Username is empty show text Please Enter User Name
LOGIN If Password is empty show text Please Enter Password
LOGIN If Username is wrong show text Please check the User Name
LOGIN If Password is wrong show text Please check the Password
LOGIN If Username and Password is correct
Posts Reducer Should return initial state when empty action is passed
Posts Reducer Should return initial state when wrong action is passed
Posts Reducer Should return the required data when action POSTS_REQUEST is passed
Posts Reducer Should return the required data when action POSTS_SUCCESS is passed
Posts Reducer Should return the required data when action POSTS_FAILED is passed
Posts Reducer Should return the required data when action SET_POSTS is passed
Home should render no data found if the api response gives no posts
Home should render no data found if there are no matching posts after searching
Home should render Posts
Home should render only the searched Posts
Home should not render the other Posts
Home should change data on next Click
Home should change data on direct click
Home should change data on prev click
Home next button should be visible initially
Home next button should not be visible when the last page is active
Home prev button should not be visible initially
Home should render the correct search results on page change
Home should navigate to Login Page when LOGOUT is clicked
Auth Reducer Should return the initial state when empty action is passed
Auth Reducer Should return the initial state when wrong action is passed
Auth Reducer Should return isLoggedIn as true when wrong LOGIN action
Auth Reducer Should return isLoggedIn as true when wrong LOGIN action
Posts Actions fetchPosts Fetching Posts Success
Posts Actions fetchPosts Fetching Posts Failure
App should render Login when user is not Logged in
